information.
When a Disclosure Requirement in ESRS 2 does not have topical specifications, ESRS 2 has to be
applied as specified in ESRS 2 Disclosure Requirement. No additional datapoints to those in ESRS
2 or considerations at topical level apply in these cases. If ESRS 2 does not set topical specifications
